Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix swipe-to-delete functionality for mobile

Bug fixes:
- Fixed delete button not responding to clicks: handleSwipeStart was
  calling handleSwipeCancel\(\) which hid the delete button before the
  click event could fire. Now checks if click target is the delete
  button and returns early.
- Fixed checkbox intercepting delete button clicks: Added CSS to disable
  pointer-events on checkbox when row is in swipe-revealed state.
- Fixed red X remaining visible after deletion: Created combined
  deleteSetWithSwipeReset\(\) function and updated handleSwipeCancel\(\)
  to clear transforms on all set rows.
- Added media query for hover effects so delete buttons only show on
  hover for desktop devices \(pointer: fine\).
- Increased z-index of delete button when revealed to ensure it''s
  clickable above other elements.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Redesign rest timer as inline progress bar per exercise

- Replace global timer popup with inline timer bar in each exercise card
- Timer bar shows full \(blue\) when idle, shrinks as countdown progresses
- Add +10s/-10s buttons that work in both idle and running states
- Center exercise name and category badge in workout cards
- Change workout date display from ISO timestamp to calendar format

New features:
- Per-exercise timer tracking with activeTimerExerciseIndex state
- getTimerProgress\(\) calculates bar fill percentage
- isTimerActiveForExercise\(\) checks which exercise timer is running
- adjustTimer\(\) modifies default rest_seconds when idle, running timer when active
- formatWorkoutDate\(\) formats dates as "Sun, Jan 12, 2026"

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
